nodes.text: Reg was a male Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. In 3631 BBY he was approached in the Old World by a renegade member of the Knights of Zakuul Senya Tirall, who was looking for information about the Lady of Sorrows. Afraid that the presence of a Knight in the Old World would be put on him by the Heralds of Zildrog, he alerted the Heralds to Tirall's presence. With the help of The Commander Senya killed the Heralds and proceeded to interrogate Reg. Unable to connect her to the Lady of Sorrows, Reg send her to Mona Gale instead. However, shortly after Senya and the Outlander left, Reg was killed by the Heralds of Zildrog.
Reg appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 7: The Lady of Sorrows.
